Key Match Events: Babar Azam's Pakistan failed to chase down 131 runs from 20 overs.
Sikander Raza did major damage to their batting line-up and Brad Evans held his nerve to defend 11 runs in the final over.
Pakistan, what have you done? Twice in a row, they have lost games they should have won and this loss may have just seen their chances of getting ahead into the tournament dented big time.
Zimbabwe stunned Pakistan after clinching a final over thriller.
Shaheen Afridi runs hard but the throw is good enough to the keeper who clips the bails off.
Brad Evans cannot believe what just happened! What a match! Full and on middle, it is pushed to long on.
Sikandar Raza is the Player of the Match.
Sikandar Raza helped Zimbabwe clinch a famous win
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam, the captain of Pakistan says they wanted to bowl first as there might be some movement earlier on.
Craig Ervine, the skipper of Zimbabwe says the wicket will play pretty much the same and they want to put up a good score on the board and put them under pressure.
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Ervine, the skipper of Zimbabwe says it is a special win. They worked hard to get in this round.
Babar Azam, the captain of Pakistan says they should have chased this down but are disappointed as they are not up to the mark with the bat.
Sikandar Raza says he is lost for words and is proud of these players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The World Cup keeps on giving surprises.
Zimbabwe are on cloud 9, they are elated.
Zimbabwe are celebrating it with the fans.

What a win! What a win this is! Pakistan, what have you done? Twice in a row, they have lost games they should have won and this loss may have just seen their chances of getting ahead into the tournament dented big time.
Others: Shadab Khan says the catch was brilliant by Babar Azam, he has not been at his best in the field but he took a stunner.
That is a really good performance with the ball by Pakistan! Zimbabwe on the other hand will be very disappointed with the score they have on the board.
